member.name: T:nanoFramework.DependencyInjection.ActivatorUtilities
member.summary: Helper code for the various activator services.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.DependencyInjection.ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance(System.IServiceProvider,System.Type,System.Object[])
member.summary: Instantiate a type with constructor arguments provided directly and/or from an .
member.param: The service provider used to resolve dependencies.
The type to activate.
Constructor arguments not provided by the .
member.exception: A suitable constructor for type could not be located. Ensure the type is concrete and all parameters of a public constructor are either registered as services or passed as arguments. Also ensure no extraneous arguments are provided.

member.name: M:nanoFramework.DependencyInjection.ActivatorUtilities.GetServiceOrCreateInstance(System.IServiceProvider,System.Type,System.Object[])
member.summary: Retrieve an instance of the given type from the service provider. If one is not found then instantiate it directly.
member.param: The service provider.
The type of the service.
Constructor arguments not provided by the .
member.returns: The resolved service or created instance.
member.exception: Unable to resolve a service while attempting to activate a constructor.

The .

member.name: T:System.Activator
member.summary: Contains methods to create types of objects locally. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:System.Activator.CreateInstance(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the type whose name is specified, using the named assembly.
member.param: The fully qualified name of the type to create an instance of.

member.name: M:System.Activator.CreateInstance(System.Type)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the specified type using that type's parameterless constructor.
member.param: The type of object to create.

member.name: M:System.Activator.CreateInstance(System.Type,System.Object[])
member.summary: Creates an instance of the specified type using the constructor that best matches the specified parameters.
member.param: The type of object to create.

An array of arguments that match in number, order, and type the parameters of the constructor to invoke. If is an empty array or null, the constructor that takes no parameters (the parameterless constructor) is invoked.

member.name: M:System.Activator.CreateInstance(System.Type,System.Type[],System.Object[])
member.summary: Creates an instance of the specified type using the constructor that best matches the specified parameters.
member.param: The type of object to create.
An array of Type objects representing the number, order, and type of the parameters for the desired constructor. If types is an empty array or null, to get constructor that takes no parameters.

An array of arguments that match in number, order, and type the parameters of the constructor to invoke. If is an empty array or null, the constructor that takes no parameters (the parameterless constructor) is invoked.
